Maintained the exports product delivering crucial data to customers.
Promoted from front-end to full-stack after 3 months.
Separated the front-end and back-end codebases, modernizing the interaction between them.
Replaced legacy “hacks” such as html tables and iFrames with modern standards such as AJAX and the latest CSS.
Built a graphical template builder for creating customized invoices using PHP and TWIG.
Configured profiles for the spidering and crawling of website content to be translated.
Adjusted HTML, JavaScript and CSS as necessary for localization.
Performed analysis of web sites and applications for localization potential.
Developed scripts to automate file parsing and filtering, and other related activities.
Improved architecture of Magneto based e-commerce site by switching from PHP to HHVM and updating code to be compatible.
Integrated Amazon MWS API feed submissions to enable automated syncing with Magento products.
Implemented front-end layout for database record lookup and excel-like editing.
Interned while taking classes for BBA.
Provided technical support for various clients.
Performed diagnostics and troubleshooting of system issues, documented help desk tickets/resolutions, and maintained equipment inventory lists.
Configured Domain Controllers, Active Directory, and Microsoft SQL.
